docs.snippet: Leo E. Archer, who retired last July after forty years in the passenger department of the International Mercantile Marine Company, has been appointed general passenger traffic manager of the MooreMcCormack Lines, Inc., operators of the American...
docs.lead_paragraph: Leo E. Archer, who retired last July after forty years in the passenger department of the International Mercantile Marine Company, has been appointed general passenger traffic manager of the MooreMcCormack Lines, Inc., operators of the American Republics Line, according to an announcement yesterday by Robert C. Lee, executive vice president of the company.
docs.abstract: L E Archer apptd gen passenger traffic mgr

headline.main: LEO ARCHER JOINS MOORE-M'CORMACK; With I M. M. 40 Years He Will Be Passenger Manager for American Republics Line KNOWS THE THREE SHIPS Veteran Booking Man Handled Them for Panama PacificNew Post for W. C. Neven

docs.snippet: The stamp collection of President Roosevelt, "America's No. 1 philatelist," will shortly receive additions in the form of blocks of four of postal adhesives of Argentina, Brazil, Trinidad and Tobago, and Uruguay, as a gift from Captain Harry Sadler...
docs.lead_paragraph: The stamp collection of President Roosevelt, "America's No. 1 philatelist," will shortly receive additions in the form of blocks of four of postal adhesives of Argentina, Brazil, Trinidad and Tobago, and Uruguay, as a gift from Captain Harry Sadler of the American Republics liner Brazil, it was announced here yesterday by the steamship company.

docs.snippet: Diplomatic relations between Bolivia and Paraguay will be formally resumed tomorrow when their new Ministers simultaneously present their credentials here and at Asuncion in the presence of the diplomatic representatives of the six American nations...
docs.lead_paragraph: Diplomatic relations between Bolivia and Paraguay will be formally resumed tomorrow when their new Ministers simultaneously present their credentials here and at Asuncion in the presence of the diplomatic representatives of the six American nations that acted as mediators at the Chaco peace conference.
